title: 5 Tips to Create a Handmade & Vintage Home
itunes:title: 5 Tips to Create a Handmade & Vintage Home Create a Home You Love Frugally
description: Having a home that is beautiful and functional is extremely important, especially now when many of us are spending more time there. These tips will help you create a vintage and handmade home with easy frugal ideas with inspiration from Lisa of Farmhouse On Boone. Resources at https://melissaknorris.com/248
